name: ShowNPSSurvey
description: Show nps survey

description: Show qualitative survey

name: FreeBumpUpEnabled
description: User can bump sharing

name: PricedBumpUpEnabled
description: User can bump paying

name: UserReviewsReportEnabled
description: User reviews report enabled

name: DynamicQuickAnswers
description: Random quick answers with different approaches

name: DefaultRadiusDistanceFeed
description: Default distance radius main feed.

name: RealEstateEnabled
description: Allow to see Real Estate category

name: SearchAutocomplete
description: Search suggestions with/without categories filtering.

name: ShowPriceAfterSearchOrFilter
description: Show price in feed products when user applies any search or filter

name: RequestsTimeOut
description: API requests timeout

name: HomeRelatedEnabled
description: Show the related button in the main feed

name: TaxonomiesAndTaxonomyChildrenInFeed
description: Taxonomies and taxonomy children in feed as filter tags

name: NewItemPage
description: New item page with card appearance and different navigation

name: ShowPriceStepRealEstatePosting
description: show price on real estate listing

name: ShowClockInDirectAnswer
description: Show a clock until the message is delivered correctly

name: PromoteBumpUpAfterSell
description: Show a bump up alert after posting (once every 24h)

name: MoreInfoAFShOrDFP
description: show ad in more info, could be Adsense for shopping or DFP

name: MostSearchedDemandedItems
description: Display a list of top seller items that inspire users to post new items

name: AllowCallsForProfessionals
description: Users can call professional sellers

name: RealEstateImprovements
description: show onboarding improvements on real estate category

name: RealEstatePromos
description: show real estate promos

name: ShowAdsInFeedWithRatio
description: show ads in feed every X cells

name: RealEstateFlowType
description: Real Estate Flow Type

name: RemoveCategoryWhenClosingPosting
description: Remove category real estate if user closes posting

name: RealEstateNewCopy
description: Try real estate copy instead of housing

name: DummyUsersInfoProfile
description: Add info for dummy users in profile

name: ShowInactiveConversations
description: Show button to access inactive conversations

name: MainFeedAspectRatio
description: Limit the aspect ratio of the images in the main feed

name: IncreaseMinPriceBumps
description: Charge min price of 1.99$ instead of 0.99$ on bumps

name: ShowSecurityMeetingChatMessage
description: show a disclaimer message on chat after the first conversation from the interlocutor

name: NoAdsInFeedForNewUsers
description: Change logic for showing ads to new users (2 weeks old)

name: EmojiSizeIncrement
description: Increase the size of emojis the text is only emojis and < 4

name: ShowBumpUpBannerOnNotValidatedListings
description: Show the bump banner for listings pending validation
